parameters.name: apiKey

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: A user id token whose User info needs to be retrieved.

parameters.name: ForresterAuth
parameters.description: Forrester legacy user token. Required if user id token is not available. This is to support backward compatibility for legacy web users (ex. seamless login).  **This parameter is marked as deprecated.**

parameters.description: A user id token issued by Auth0 (Bearer Authorization header) for the user.

parameters.name: ForresterAuth
parameters.description: Forrester legacy user token. Required if user id token is not available. This is to support backward compatibility for legacy web users (ex. seamless login).  **This parameter is marked as deprecated so that API consumers are advised not to use this as part of any new development.**

get.summary: Retrieves content based on ID provided.
get.description: Retrieves content based on ID provided.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description:
A custom header value that must be supplied to authorize the api consumer. 

Contact Forrester support to get a valid apiKey.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID to retrieve content

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
The type of Content.

Must follow a naming convention. Ex. ForresterNow content type must begin with "fn"

**Currently supported types are - fnComposition**

get.summary: Retrieves list of contents based on tags provided.
get.description: Retrieves list of contents based on tags provided if there are no tags we get everything from contentful.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description:
A custom header value that must be supplied to authorize the api consumer. 

Contact Forrester support to get a valid apiKey.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma separated list of tags.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
The type of Content.

Must follow a naming convention. Ex. ForresterNow content type must begin with "fn"

**Currently supported types are - fnComposition, fnFeatured, fnForresterFirst**

get.summary: Index the content into elasticsearch by content ID.
get.description: Retrieves content(fnComposition) based on ID from contentful then parse the content into the object model used by elastic search and index the parsed content into elastic search.

parameters.description:
A custom header value that must be supplied to authorize the api consumer. 

Contact Forrester support to get a valid apiKey.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID to retrieve content

get.summary: Retrieves list of contents and index them into elasticsearch.

parameters.description:
A custom header value that must be supplied to authorize the api consumer. 

Contact Forrester support to get a valid apiKey.

post.summary: Creates job to retrieve bulk list of Research Documents, Webinar etc metadata.
post.description: This API is used to create bulk contents metadata job. Once the job is created, the API will return the job information. The Job Information will be used to check the status of the job and to retrieve the bulk metadata by making calls to the Get Content's Job Info and Get metadeta APIs respectively.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: API version.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: A custom header value that must be supplied to authorize the api consumer

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: Type of content to retrieve. ResearchDocument, Webinar etc.

parameters.name: publishedAfter
parameters.description: Starting published date in yyyy-MM-dd format. If populated, only those contents published on this date or after this date will be retrieved. If the published after is not populated or populated with a year or older date, the full content will be retrieved with content ordered by published data in descending order (latest contents appearing first)

parameters.name: metaDataOnly
parameters.description: meta data only indicator

get.summary: Retrieves bulk content request job information.
get.description: This API is mainly used retrieve bulk content request job information. This will be used to provide information on the status, number of number pages etc

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: API version.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: Job id returned from bulk API Create Job API.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: A custom header value that must be supplied to authorize the api consumer

get.summary: Retrieves bulk list of Research Documents metadata.
get.description: Retrieves detailed information on all research documents for a client. The research documents will be retrieved in paginated fashion.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: API version.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: Job id returned from bulk API Create Job API.

parameters.name: p
parameters.description: The page number of the research documents to be returned. This number needs to be less or equal to the number of pages returned from the Reseach Document Job Status api. Pagination information is included in the "pageable" field of each page. The "pageable" field includes total number of pages, items included in the current page, indicator if current page is a last page and more.

parameters.name: l
parameters.description: The number of the research documents to be included in a page. Default is 50.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: A custom header value that must be supplied to authorize the api consumer

get.summary: Retrieves bulk list of Webinars metadata.
get.description: Retrieves detailed information on all webinars for a client.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: API version.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: Job id returned from bulk API Create Job API.

parameters.name: p
parameters.description: The page number of webinars to be returned. This number needed to be less or equal to the number of pages returned from Job Status api. Pagination information is included in the "pageable" field of each page. The "pageable" field includes total number of pages, items included in the current page, indicator if current page is a last page and more.

parameters.name: l
parameters.description: The page number of webinars to be included in a page.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: A custom header value that must be supplied to authorize the api consumer

description.example: 30-minute research-based session with a Forrester analyst focused on your specific question or challenge.
30-minute research-based session with a Forrester analyst focused on your specific question or challenge.
30-minute research-based session with a Forrester analyst focused on your specific question or challenge.

title.example: Stepping up Mobile App with Voice and Notification Experiences

highlights.example: Mobile emerges as the central link for customers in their digital ecosystem

familyName.example: Analyst Inquiry for Marketing & Strategy Professionals
Analyst Inquiry for Marketing & Strategy Professionals

title.example: Assess And Enhance Your Modern Application Delivery Journey

subTitle.example: Assessment: The Modern Application Delivery Playbook

researchAbstract.example: Customer-obsessed organizations increasingly expect application leaders to speed and scale software delivery. Many application development and delivery (AD&D) leaders know they need to improve, but they struggle with what to do and where to start. Different teams face different challenges, but the patterns are consistent across organizations. Forrester's modern application delivery (MAD) assessment helps app development leaders determine where they are in the journey and take the appropriate next steps.

startTime.description: Webinar start date and time. Shows date only for past webinars.

title.example: What's Ahead For ABM In 2020? (Hint: The Answer Starts With "E")

webinarAbstract.example: Account-based marketing (ABM) is becoming the way marketing gets done, with B2B demand generation efforts focusing predominantly on accounts, not leads. In fact, ABM now involves more than just marketing. It encompasses every aspect of creating long-term customer relationships and differentiated customer experiences — and many parts of your company must play their part in reaching this goal.

password.description: Password (Required only for non enterprise customers)

title.example: US Insurance Customers Love Their Agents
